info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:13PM EDT until August 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Southwestern Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 513 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Gaffney to 11 miles west of Union to 13 miles north of Laurens, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Gaffney, Pacolet, Cowpens, Roebuck, Jonesville, Pacolet Mills, Moore, Croft State Park, Cedar Springs and Thicketty. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
